about_the_game:
Immerse yourself into unstable reality.
[/p]

In order to get out you must exploit glitch in a world around you.

You can be sure of one thing, any rules you known no longer exist!!

Do you have a courage to dip in it?

Glitchphobia is a experimental game, which relies on the psychological approach to the player and the use of his typical habits and behaviors. It exploits commonly accepted standards from games as well as life activities from reality as a way to introduce the 'glitch', thanks to which the game mechanics are different from the classical logic games and beyond the usual patterns.

Key Features

- Experimental, unique and memorable gameplay

- Designed glitchy reality

- Focusing on psychological, emotional and conflicting moral decisions

- Story build around phobia treatment

- Hard to learn, easy to master

content_descriptors.notes:
Game is focusing on self awareness,  psychological, emotional and conflicting moral decisions. 
May cause anxiety, feeling lost and treat players as lab subjects.
